fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Choose {up to} four players. <Determine if any of them are (killing) roles. If any are (not),> grant them a (Basic) attack, <(a one-time use Powerful defense shield)>, and attack them. {If any are}, force them to [target themselves {during the next day's voting. You also] shoot them.}
- **Cleave** during the day, removing the text in braces.
- **Chop** during the day, removing the text in chevrons.
- **Carve** during the day, removing the text in brackets.
- **Cut** during the day, removing the text in parentheses.
